content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 23, "index": 10}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 13, "index": 14}, {"type": "coal_block", "quantity": 7, "index": 15}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 3, "index": 18}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 21, "index": 19}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "spruce_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 22}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 24, "index": 24}, {"type": "purple_concrete_powder", "quantity": 11, "index": 25}, {"type": "brain_coral_block", "quantity": 54, "index": 26}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 54, "index": 27}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 31, "index": 34}, {"type": "lilac", "quantity": 60, "index": 40}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 7, "index": 41}, {"type": "farmland", "quantity": 21, "index": 42}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 64, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a diamond shovel, I first need to craft a stick. A stick can be crafted using any planks, and I have dark oak planks at slot 30. Therefore, I will move the dark oak planks to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
